items.title: College
items.description: Born and raised in the Upper Midwest, I spent my childhood tinkering with Legos and learning about the history of people who lived long ago in faraway places.

items.title: Childhood
items.description: My passion for building things and learning about different viewpoints combined in my post-secondary education, where I gained proficiency in human and computer languages while focusing on securing software applications.

items.title: Career
items.description: Since graduating, I have specialized in synthesizing unique approaches to engineering solutions for both government and the private sector. Continue browsing to learn more.
